sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the regularity of various chromosome anomalies among heredity inquires.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討各類遺傳諮詢者染色體核型異常發生規律。

sentences.english: The karyotype analysis of Tradescantia virginiana L. (Commelinaceae).
sentences.chinese: 大花紫露草染色體核型的研究。

sentences.english: Chromosome numbers and karyotype analysis of 9 species in Hydrocharitaceae.
sentences.chinese: 九種水鱉科植物染色體數目及其核型分析。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyze abnormal chromosome karyotype and pathogenesis of primary amenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析原發閉經患者染色體核型與病因。

sentences.english: Karyotype analysis of two species of Medicago.
sentences.chinese: 兩種苜蓿植物的核型分析。

sentences.english: Endosperm formation is nuclear type and the endosperm forms chalazal haustorium.
sentences.chinese: 核型胚乳，合點端具胚乳吸器。

sentences.english: Over 435 bands Within the mouse karyotype can be distinguished.
sentences.chinese: 核型中可識別的帶紋達435條。

sentences.english: Karyotype analyses in Lycoris haywardii and L. sprengeri.
sentences.chinese: 標題紅藍石蒜和換錦花的染色體核型分析。
四福花染色體核型的分析。

sentences.english: Results There were 38 chromosome aberrations(29 women, 9 men) in them, the abnormal rate being 3.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現染色體異常核型38例，異常發生率爲3。

sentences.english: Methods:Karyotype analysis of the peripheral blood lymphocytes were carried out with G-banding.
sentences.chinese: 方法取受檢者外周血淋巴細胞培養，G顯帶核型分析。

sentences.english: Cytological study relieved that it was a diploid with 30chromosomes and its karyotype was 1A.
sentences.chinese: 細胞學研究發現，其染色體數爲30，核型屬1A型。

sentences.english: The present paper deals with the karyotypes of 30 taxa of genus Citrus.
sentences.chinese: 作者研究了柑桔屬30個分類羣的核型及進化。

sentences.english: Microsporogenensis studying and karyotype analysis of Juglans regia L. and J. hopeiensis Hu.
sentences.chinese: 普通核桃和河北核桃的小孢子發生及核型研究。

sentences.english: In this paper, we have studied the karyotype of 11 species of Malus plants in China.
sentences.chinese: 本文對11種蘋果屬植物染色體核型進行了研究。

sentences.english: There were no abnormal karyotype in bone marrow cells.

definition: allele (one of two paired gene in diploid organism)
